MetaRecognizer MetaAspectJ 1.3 Recognizer Run 'java Main [-showtree] directory-full-of-java-files' [The -showtree option pops up a Swing frame that shows the AST constructed from the parser.] Run 'java Main ' Contributing authors: David Zook dzook@cc.gatech.edu Shan Shan Huang ssh@cc.gatech.edu Version 1.00 September 1, 2003 -- initial release Taken from java.g from antlr.org and This grammar is in the PUBLIC DOMAIN
